message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can finalize the deal.
You were too generous in round 1. I'll take a smaller share, but I'm still interested in a deal.
You're not getting the better deal, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You're trying to squeeze me, but I'm not going to give up yet. I'll make a counteroffer.
You're running out of time, Bob. Take this offer or walk away.
You're getting desperate, but I'm not. I'll make a final offer, but it's my last one.
